<a id="DPITexture"></a>

# DPITexture

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An automatically scalable [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) based on an SVG image.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An automatically scalable [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) based on an SVG image. **DPITexture**\\ s are used to automatically re-rasterize icons and other texture based UI theme elements to match viewport scale and font oversampling. See also [ProjectSettings.display/window/stretch/mode](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_display/window/stretch/mode) ("canvas_items" mode) and [Viewport.oversampling_override](Viewport.md#Viewport_property_oversampling_override).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="DPITexture_property_base_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **base_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_property_base_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_base_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_base_scale**\ (\ )

Texture scale. ``1.0`` is the original SVG size. Higher values result in a larger image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="DPITexture_property_color_map"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **color_map** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_property_color_map)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_map**\ (\ value\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\ )
- [Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **get_color_map**\ (\ )

If set, remaps texture colors according to [Color](Color.md)-[Color](Color.md) map.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="DPITexture_property_saturation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **saturation** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_property_saturation)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_saturation**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_saturation**\ (\ )

Overrides texture saturation.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="DPITexture_method_create_from_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[DPITexture](DPITexture.md) **create_from_string**\ (\ source\: [String](String.md), scale\: [float](float.md) = 1.0, saturation\: [float](float.md) = 1.0, color_map\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md) = \{\}\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_method_create_from_string)

Creates a new **DPITexture** and initializes it by allocating and setting the SVG data from string.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="DPITexture_method_get_scaled_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_scaled_rid**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_method_get_scaled_rid)

Returns the [RID](RID.md) of the texture rasterized to match the oversampling of the currently drawn canvas item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_size_override**\ (\ size\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#DPITexture_method_set_size_override)
